resources.string: Dear kids and their parents, \n\nWe are glad to present you our app. The purpose of this app is to help little kids to learn the alphabet of Chechen language.

From our experience, we know that kids remember new information when it is given in a form of a game.\nBecause of this we have made this app as a game. Children will learn the alphabet in a way of game and will have fun during the process.
So how to play? It is very simple. First thing that you need to do is go to the page with all letters and study them. After that you can start the game.
A part of a logo of abat
By the way, there are also another apps to improve your chechen language. If you want to explore them, click on the button below :)
